segments.text: I glance at the kitchen scene, and it's full of little details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's focused on drying that single plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window makes it feel inviting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I see the faucet running wild, sink overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's sheeting down, creating a hazardous puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in it blindly, this is infuriating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on the stool, arm in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's balancing a plate too, what a daredevil.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are spreading, it won't hold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's reaching up, eager for her cookie reward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring quietly, breaking the rules together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, untouched by this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR
